<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataKP extends data { const CODE = 'KP'; const PREFIX = 850; const REGION = 'Asia'; const PATTERNS = array( '85\d{6}|(?:19\d|2)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:2\d|85)\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '19[1-3]\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
